entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
